msbt.message: Have you heard the rumor yet? They're saying that our island will be hosting its first big event soon. I can't wait! If we all get behind it, it's sure to be an enormous success, !
At last! 's first big event starts tomorrow!Time to get in the spirit, everyone! Let's make this a rollicking good time!

The Fishing Tourney takes place this Saturday, you know. You're planning to participate, aren't you, darling? What am I sayingof COURSE you are! It's a fabulous event and lots of fun. Who could possibly miss that?! Also, darling, you don't have to run around and work up a sweat, which is why I'll be joining.

The Fishing Tourney takes place tomorrow. I do hope you're prepared! I've had all of my gear laid out and ready to go since yesterday!Although, I confess that "all of my gear"is just my fishing rod. Hee-hee!
Did you hear the news? The Bug-Off is happening this Saturday!I've never been especially good at catching bugs, but I will not let that deter me!
Wonderful news, darling! The Bug-Off is ON tomorrow!I'm going to chase after those bugs like I chase after the bouquets at my friends' weddings!
Darling! Do you know what's happening tomorrow? Why, the fireworks show, of course! It'll be the perfect opportunity to get all dressed up and enjoy some bright lights, !
Are you all ready? Tomorrow morning, the Happy Home Academy is coming to evaluate your house.Tidying up, rearranging If you have any last-minute fixes to make or fussing to do, now is the time!
Oh, , have you checked the evaluation from the Happy Home Academy yet? The score you receive does reflect on you. Do take it seriously, my dear.

We survived another year, my dear. But it felt like a short one, didn't it?<10_4 /> I suppose that's proof we had fun! Speaking of fun, don't forget to join everyone in the plaza on New Year's Eve for the Countdown party!
Can you believe will be done tomorrow? It doesn't feelreal.Well, perhaps it will feel real once we start the Countdown party and ring in a brand-new year!

It's almost Mayand that means May Day is nearly here, darling!Jet-setting off to another island for the May Day eventhow fabulous is that going to be? Oh no! I only have until May 1st to decide what to pack for the trip! So many beautiful outfits, so little time!

Today is April 30th, so Oh dear! Tomorrow is May Day?!I really must go to Resident Services tomorrow and get my May Day Ticket from Tom Nook! You have to get yours too, darling! You can't get to the event without one, .

Do you recall the significance of October 31st? I dearly hope you do, darling.That's Halloween! Everyone who's anyone will be out that night, looking for candyfrom you.So, stock up on those sweets. Because if you don't Let's just say it'll get very interesting!

Halloween is almost here. I'll have you know, I agonized over the choice of my costume.So, I hope you've found all the candy you can for tomorrow. Or at least enough for me.I'll do my part to make sure it's a marvelous night. You just bring the candy, !
